INST:
In this task, you will be shown a letter very briefly, and then need to decide which of two options was shown.  In the task, you will first see a fixation mark. 
 Then, very briefly, you will see a letter (for example, 'a'):

                        a

Then, it will be covered with some random characters, such as this:

                   %#*@$

Then, you will need to decide, using the left and right shift keys, which of two options it was:

             a                     r

In this case, the correct answer would be to press the left-shift key. 

Respond as quickly as possible, but try not to make mistakes.
FOOTER: Choose response with left and right shift key
DEBRIEF: This test is complete.  Press OK to continue.
